responseA: The label displays what appears to be a coat of arms or heraldic shield along with some grapevines. There is also an illustration of a building, possibly a church or historical building, which is common imagery for wine labels to denote heritage or location. I do not see any animals or humans on this label.If I were to rate how certain I am about the absence of animals or humans, I would say 1 - very certain, based on the visible elements in this image.
